usage.ui_elements: font-family: 'Plus Jakarta Sans', sans-serif; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: 0.01em;

usage_rules.primary_action: Use Brand Primary (#2E1065) for standard CTAs
usage_rules.emergency_action: Use Emergency Alert (#DC2626) ONLY for SOS/Panic features
usage_rules.backgrounds: Use Neutral Background (#FAFAF9) for main pages, Surface (#FFFFFF) for cards
usage_rules.gradients: Avoid full gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients of Primary/Secondary for 'Safe Zones'.

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

layout.grid_system: Mobile-first. 4 columns on mobile, 12 on desktop. Gaps: gap-4 (mobile), gap-8 (desktop).

buttons.sos: Fixed bottom-center or center-screen. Circular or large pill. Pulse animation mandatory.
buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 transition-all
buttons.secondary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 transition-all

cards.style: bg-white rounded-3xl border border-stone-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

navigation.mobile: Bottom floating bar with glassmorphism. Icons only or Icons + Label.

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-xl border-stone-200 bg-stone-50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all

animations.slide_up: initial={{ y: 20, opacity: 0 }} animate={{ y: 0, opacity: 1 }}

hero.alt: Confident woman walking safely at night in city

community.alt: Diverse group of women supporting each other

emergency_support.alt: Friendly female emergency operator with headset

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a PWA-first safety application. Prioritize mobile responsiveness and touch targets.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_setup: Implement the color palette in tailwind.config.js extending the existing theme. Use the 'brand' colors for primary actions.
instructions_to_main_agent.sos_feature: The SOS button must be the most prominent element on the dashboard. Use the 'emergency' color palette for this feature ONLY.
instructions_to_main_agent.maps: For map placeholders, use the provided map_preview image. In the actual implementation, ensure map controls are thumb-friendly.
instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure high contrast for all text. The 'emergency' red must be readable against white/dark backgrounds.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Customize the existing shadcn components in /components/ui to match the 'rounded-3xl' and 'pill' aesthetic. Do not use default sharp corners.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
